Articles.Content:
![kNVhImj.png](http://i.imgur.com/kNVhImj.png)

Flies pretty well. I'm at a loss for further words.
Just when we thought 1.0.2 aero was realistic...... This happens.
oooh, I bet I can build a really compact stabilizing system for 6/8 booster rockets with this.

> 
> Just when we thought 1.0.2 aero was realistic...... This happens.

Whoever told you that has not played KSP...
Just remember that Germany was gonna fly these: [https://youtu.be/bqqQ48KFXJE](https://youtu.be/bqqQ48KFXJE)

> 
> Just when we thought 1.0.2 aero was realistic...... This happens.

What's unrealistic about that?

[![ellplane.jpg](https://1.bp.blogspot.com/_6B8tPuW7TwQ/SbD1T9dLDgI/AAAAAAAALek/jtK7rISpNJk/s400/ellplane.jpg)](http://englishrussia.com/2009/03/05/ellipse-wings/)

Believe it or not but this thing DOES fly.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-23T18:58:32Z" title="06/23/2015 06:58  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 23, 2015</time> by Tex\_NL**

> 
> Just when we thought 1.0.2 aero was realistic...... This happens.

![we10.jpg](https://i2.wp.com/discaircraft.greyfalcon.us/picturesb/picturesc/we10.jpg)

![300px-SNECMA_Col%C3%A9opt%C3%A8re_on_ramp_1959.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/ca/SNECMA_Col%C3%A9opt%C3%A8re_on_ramp_1959.jpg/300px-SNECMA_Col%C3%A9opt%C3%A8re_on_ramp_1959.jpg)

![IW_Caproni_Stipa_01.jpg](http://www.italianways.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/IW_Caproni_Stipa_01.jpg)

> Flies pretty well. I'm at a loss for further words.

Forgive my aerodynamics ignorance, but why shouldn't that fly?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-23T20:10:45Z" title="06/23/2015 08:10  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 23, 2015</time> by BigFatStupidHead**

Aww. I was expecting this

![uAFbTgr.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/uAFbTgr.jpg)

...but then it was just a Lerche. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Forgive my aerodynamics ignorance, but why shouldn't that fly?

I ask the same question. As they say, even a brick can fly, if you throw it hard enough.

If you're interested in the philosophy and intent of KSP aero, [check out this article](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/325-Overhauled-Aerodynamics?p=1667861#comment_1667861). And also HarvesteR's reply & linked picture, in the first page of comments.

As a kid I amazed my friends by constructing simple ring shaped paper airplanes and flying them right in front of their eyes. If you don't believe it then just do a google search for round paper airplanes. Have fun.

> 
> As a kid I amazed my friends by constructing simple ring shaped paper airplanes and flying them right in front of their eyes.

I did the same!
I made the Lerche in ksp using KAX and a cockpit mod. Then added weapons via BD Armoury.

Reminds me of how I built paper planes that were almost perfectly flat, well, planes. Weighted towards the front with some vertical stabilizers that doubled as stability weighs, the things glide quite well.
